text:
A vi#Sasvaq SaM tOqkAya# taqnuvE$ syOqnaH || 
ajyA#nIrEqtA upa# dadhAtyEqtA vai dEqvatAq apa#rAjitAqstA Eqva pra vi#Satiq naiva jI#yatE brahmavAqdinO# vadantiq yada#d^^rdhamAqsA mAsA# Ruqtava#H saM~Mvathsaqra OSha#dhIqH pacaqntyathaq kasmA#daqnyAByO# dEqvatA$Bya AgrayaqNaM niru#pyataq ityEqtA hi tad-dEqvatA# uqdaja#yaqnq yadRuqtuByO# niqrvapE$d dEqvatA$ByaH saqmada#M daddhyAdAgrayaqNaM ( ) niqrupyaiqtA Ahu#tI rjuhOtyad^^rdhamAqsAnEqva mAsA#nRuqtUnth sa#M~MvathsaqraM prI#NAtiq na dEqvatA$ByaH saqmada#M dadhAti BaqdrAnnaqH SrEyaqH sama#naiShTa dEvAq ityA#ha huqtAdyA#yaq yaja#mAnaqsyA&*pa#rABAvAya || 8
(praqjAqpaqtyAM - ~MlOqkAya# - dEvAH - pitO - dadhyAdAgrayaqNaM - pa~jca#vi(gm)SatiSca) (A2)
